001package com.technototes.library.control;
002
003import com.technototes.library.command.Command;
004import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
005import java.util.function.Consumer;
006import java.util.function.Function;
007
008/** Class for command buttons for gamepad
009 * @author Alex Stedman
010 */
011public class CommandButton extends ButtonBase implements CommandInput<CommandButton> {
012
013    /** Make command button
014     *
015     * @param supplier The supplier for the button
016     */
017    public CommandButton(BooleanSupplier supplier) {
018        super(supplier);
019    }
020
021    @Override
022    public CommandButton getInstance() {
023        return this;
024    }
025
026    public CommandButton schedule(Function<Boolean, Command> f) {
027        return schedule(f.apply(this.getAsBoolean()));
028    }
029
030    public CommandButton schedule(Consumer<Boolean> f) {
031        return schedule(() -> f.accept(this.getAsBoolean()));
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public CommandButton setInverted(boolean invert) {
036        return (CommandButton) super.setInverted(invert);
037    }
038}
